title: Can we get AD poke back please?
body:
I've always enjoyed poke champions, and it's super sad that Riot has gibbed all of the attack damage poke options outside of Ezreal.

Shockwave spam Jayce got dumpstered (still not convinced he was OP after that very first nerf), Corki got moved to AP damage and poke got tapered off regardless, lethality Varus kinda works now since ealry-mid game is so important, but let's be real is super risky cuz he falls off the face of the planet after like 25 minutes.

Now this wouldn't be so bad, but there are a ton of real good AP poke options (I'm not going to include Zoe since she' s busted). Heimer, Velkoz, Lux, Xerath, Karma, etc.

Does anyone else think it's an issue that I can think of 5 really viable AP poke champs but only 1 really reliable AD one in Ez and one super risky one in Varus?

Also why do AP poke champs get to scale like crazy (looking at you Vel, Lux, Zoe) but AD poke champs are all super mid game focused?
